resources.string: Explanation for Main Activity: The user can choose to navigate to 4 categories (activities): Artists, Songs, Top 10 and My Playlists.

Explanation for Artists Activity: The user here can see a list from artists that will be available to choose. We will use ListView + custom ArrayAdapter for this and one more activity for each Artist Layout. Also we will have a search bar to help the user find quickly his favorite artist. Lastly the user can navigate to other activities from the menu (top right).

Explanation for Songs Activity: The user here can see a list from songs that will be available to choose. We will use ListView + custom ArrayAdapter for this. If we click the songs here, we will open the ListenSongActivity (the layout for each song). Also we will have a search bar to help the user find quickly his favorite song. Lastly the user can navigate to other activities from the menu (top right).

Explanation for Top Ten Activity: The user here can see the Top 10 Songs, Top 10 Albums and Top 10 Artists (Now i have 5 images to each category, but will have 10). If the user click the images in top songs, will open the ListenSongActivity (the layout for each song). The concept is the same for Top Albums and Top Artists (but now i dont have those two activities for each album and artist). I am not sure though how to achieve this layout dynamically. Lastly the user can navigate to other activities from the menu (top right).

Explanation for My Playlists Activity: Here the user can see the most Recent Playlist and his Other Playlists. Also we will have a search bar to help the user find quickly his favorite playlist and a floating action button to create a new Playlist. If we click now the play icon within Recent Playlist, we will open the ListenSongActivity, but we will have a ListenPlaylistActivity for this action. Lastly the user can navigate to other activities from the menu (top right).

Explanation for Listen Song Acitvity: Here the user will be able to listen the songs. For this purpose we will use ExoPlayer Library (an extensible media player for Android). Also we will provide more songs for the user (with the next songs category). Lastly the user can navigate to other activities from the menu (top right).
